name: Plumas Pines Golf Resort
description: A scenic Graeagle golf destination with pristine fairways, mountain views, and popular group packages.

faqs.question: What’s included in Plumas Pines golf packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times, carts, and concierge trip planning. Optional add-ons include dining, transportation, and multiple-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Plumas Pines packages cost?
faqs.answer: Packages typically range from $199 to $499 per golfer depending on dates, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle group or corporate events?
faqs.answer: Yes—Golf the High Sierra manages room blocks, tournament planning, transportation, and multi-day golf trips for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Plumas Pines Golf Resort | Graeagle Golf Groups & Stay and Pla
meta.description: Book Plumas Pines in Graeagle with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.
